data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 287,400 citizens of Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Mongala
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 55,245 believers in Mongala to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Mongala that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Mongala that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.focus_label: Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 287,400.

We estimate Mongala has 55,245 people who might know Jesus, 208,149 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 24,006 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Mongala
location.full_name: Mongala, Democratic Republic of the Congo
